articles.author: https://gothamist.com/staff/arun-venugopal
articles.title: NYC mayoral hopeful Mamdani faces sharp jabs from within South Asian community - Gothamist
articles.description: Some of the blows and stinging vitriol have swayed voters.
articles.content: If elected, Democrat Zohran Mamdani would be the first Asian American and Muslim mayor to lead New York City. While his campaign won over many of New York Citys immigrant communities, hes facing some… [+8859 chars]
